branchCategory.name: CS1
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder is SMC's largest bore cylinder. This series is available in bore sizes up to 300mm and stroke lengths up to 2400mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto switch capable. Other options include, large bore sizes up to 300mm, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Lube Type
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder single rod double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This version is NOT pre-lubricated so a lubricator in your system is required. This series is available in bore sizes up to 300mm and stroke lengths up to 2400mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, large bore sizes up to 300mm, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1*N, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-lube Type
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder single rod double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This version is pre-lubricated so there is no need for a lubricator in your system. This series is available in bore sizes up to 300mm and stroke lengths up to 2400mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, large bore sizes up to 300mm, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1W, Air Cylinder, Double Acting Double Rod (Lube Type)
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder double rod, double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This version is NOT pre-lubricated so a lubricator in your system is required. This series is available in bore sizes up to 300mm and stroke lengths up to 1200mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, large bore sizes up to 300mm, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1W*N, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod (Non-lube)
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder double rod, double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This version is pre-lubricated so there is no need for a lubricator in your system. This series is available in bore sizes up to 300mm and stroke lengths up to 2400mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, large bore sizes up to 300mm, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1*Q, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Low Friction
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 air cylinder low friction single rod double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This version can be used smooth movement in low pressure situations or where lower sliding friction is needed. This series is available in bore sizes up to 160mm and stroke lengths up to 1600mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1*H, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air-hydro
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 low pressure air/hydro, single rod, double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This series is available in bore sizes up to 160mm and stroke lengths up to 1600mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include various mounting configurations.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)S1W*H, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod (Air-Hydro)
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 low pressure air/hydro, double rod, double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This series is available in bore sizes up to 160mm and stroke lengths up to 800mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>

branchItem.name: CS1, Accessory, I Type Single Knuckle Joint
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 add on, rod end single knuckle joint</p>

branchItem.name: CS1, Accessory, Y Type Double Knuckle Joint
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 add on, rod end double knuckle joint</p>

branchItem.name: CS1, Accessory, Knuckle Pin, Clevis Pin
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 add on, rod end single and double knuckle joint pins</p>

branchItem.name: CS1, Accessory, Rod End Nut
branchItem.description: <p>Series CS1 add on, rod end jam nut</p>
